message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we say $165?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
I'm starting to think you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we say $157.50?
I really appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I'm not willing to go as low as $120, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about we say $155?
